description:
[h1]Introducing... Ziplines![/h1]

This mod adds ziplines that can be strung between two poles, making traversal easy!

[h1]Features[/h1][list][*][b]Ziplines[/b][list][*]Mechanics can interact with the cable to mount onto them[*]Creations can use the [b]Zipline Rider[/b] block to mount onto them[/list][*][b]Zipline Rider:[/b] Accepts 3 button inputs to control it[/list]
name: Ziplines
